body: I was looking in the staff section and I noticed awarriorvenom is no longer there o.e anyone know why!?
body_tagged: I was looking in the staff section and I noticed awarriorvenom is no longer there o.e anyone know why!?
title: Lost Map Dev?

replies.body: I believe that he retired.
replies.body_tagged: I believe that he retired.

replies.body: :O
replies.body_tagged: :O

replies.body: Fly high Awarrior... don't give up on your dreams <3
replies.body_tagged: Fly high Awarrior... don't give up on your dreams <3

replies.body: Venom retired as map dev.
replies.body_tagged: Venom retired as map dev.

replies.body: wow 0.0 after what? 1 month? xD
replies.body_tagged: wow 0.0 after what? 1 month? xD

replies.body: A few weeks*.
replies.body_tagged: A few weeks*.

replies.body: Maybe he was too stressed, or couldn't handle it? I feel we shouldn't be discussing it too much as it may invade Awarrior's privacy. He was a good map dev while it lasted, and he made many great maps for Avicus.
replies.body_tagged: Maybe he was too stressed, or couldn't handle it? I feel we shouldn't be discussing it too much as it may invade Awarrior's privacy. He was a good map dev while it lasted, and he made many great maps for Avicus.

replies.body: He was map dev for Avicus and Akane so he was getting very busy.
replies.body_tagged: He was map dev for Avicus and Akane so he was getting very busy.

replies.body: Amen, was just wondering, I will keep this up just so other people know if they didn't, and if a mod pleases they have my approval to take this thread down if you guys don't want it up.

replies.body: I guess it's fine if Awarrior's okay with it. I'm just that type of person who feels really bad if I hurt someone's feelings unintentionally.

replies.body:
He quit both Akane and Avicus, I think he has more important goals in life and I seriously hope he achieves all he wants. Building didn't really make him happy so I suppose he's now going to spend his time on real life things like school and hockey. I wish the best for him, he always wanted to be a Map Dev and he achieved his goal, it didn't last long, but he achieved it, he climbed his way to the top and even though he didn't get to fully enjoy it he did a great work :)
Best of luck Awarrior, if you ever read this, I'll be always cheering for you :D

replies.body:
Omg .

Yes!


Thats exactly how I felt, at least I have achieved it :D


And yes, I still enjoy building and will make maps in the future ^^


I wanted Minecraft to stay fun.. So I left my fonctions both on Akane and on Avicus.  :P


Now I build what I want, when I want and for what server I want xP
